title: ISic030116. Caduceus from the city of Longane
body:
1Λονγε̄ναῖός ε̄̓μι δε̄μόσ(ιος)

1ΛΟΝΓΕ̄ΝΑΙΟΣΕ̄ΜΙΔΕ̄ΜΟΣ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after previous editions and photograph

English translation

Jonathan Prag

I am Longanaion public property

commentary

Many commentators supply the word κε͂ρυξ (herald) as a subaudible element to complete the text, but it is not clear why this should be necessary, when the standard formulation on such objects is the neuter term 'damosion' with the genitive plural of the ethnic, meaning 'public property of the people of x', and this would appear to be a simple 'speaking' variant of the same.

bibliography

  • 56.1077.B5 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 14.0594 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • 200 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000187
  • Crome 1938-1939 118 no.3 pl. 18.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002449
  • Manganaro 1996 141 with n.63 and tav. 13 fig. 11 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001821
  • Ampolo 2006 186 appendix B no.5 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002458
  • Ampolo 2013 24 fig.10 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002450
  • Hornbostel 1979 55 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002454
